contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox City Japan |Name= Higashishirakawa |JapaneseName= 東白川村 |settlement_type= Village |MapImage= Higashishirakawa in Gifu Prefecture.png |Region= [[Chūbu region|Chūbu]] |Prefecture= [[Gifu Prefecture|Gifu]] |District= [[Kamo District, Gifu|Kamo District]] |Area_km2= 87.11 |PopDate= July 2011<ref name=GifuEstimate>{{cite web|title=岐阜県の人口・世帯数人口動態統計調査結果|url=http://www.pref.gifu.lg.jp/kensei-unei/tokeijoho/kohyoshiryo/jinko-jutaku/jinko/2011/jinko201108.data/H2308kohyo.xls|work=Gifu prefectural website|publisher=Gifu Prefecture|accessdate=September 11, 2011|language=Japanese}}</ref> |Population= 2,480 |Density_km2= auto |Coords= |LatitudeDegrees = 35 |LatitudeMinutes = 39 |LatitudeSeconds = |LongtitudeDegrees = 137 |LongtitudeMinutes = 19 |LongtitudeSeconds = |Tree= ''Acer pycnanthum'' |Flower= ''Rhododendron dilatatum'' |Bird= |SymbolImage= Higashishirakawa Gifu chapter.JPG |SymbolDescription= |Mayor= Yasue Shin'ichi<ref name=sonchou>{{cite web|title=村長室へようこそ|url=http://www.vill.higashishirakawa.gifu.jp/con13.htm|work=Higashishirakawa official website|accessdate=August 13, 2011|language=Japanese}}</ref> |CityHallPostalCode= 509-1392 |CityHallAddress= Kando 548, Higashishirakawa-mura, Kamo-gun, Gifu-ken |CityHallPhone= 0574-78-3111 |CityHallLink=[http://www.vill.higashishirakawa.gifu.jp/ Village of Higashishirakawa] }} {{nihongo|'''Higashishirakawa'''|東白川村|Higashishirakawa-mura}} is a [[villages of Japan|village]] located in [[Kamo District, Gifu|Kamo District]], [[Gifu Prefecture|Gifu]], [[Japan]]. As of July 2011, the village has an estimated [[population]] of 2,480. The total area is 87.11 km². ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== {{Commons category-inline}} * [http://www.vill.higashishirakawa.gifu.jp/ Higashishirakawa official website] {{ja icon}} [[Category:Villages in Gifu Prefecture]] {{Gifu-geo-stub}}
